prompts: Create a fairy-type Pokemon with delicate wings and a floral design.
Imagine a small, whimsical Pokemon that embodies nature's beauty and grace.
Generate a cute Pokemon that resembles a flower and has a friendly demeanor.
Make a character inspired by a flower with bright colors and gentle features.
Show me a fairy Pokemon that has a soft appearance and is surrounded by blossoms.
Design a vibrant Pokemon that lives in grassy areas and spreads joy wherever it goes.
Give me an enchanting Pokemon that brings life to gardens and is adored by trainers.
